Hags enjoy meddling with other people's lives, like busybodies with cruel intentions. Any time a hag agrees to help someone, the bargain includes a price to be paid, plus a hidden plan by which  she  sets the mortal up to fail, or a way that  she  gains leverage (whether over the deal-maker or someone else). When a  hag  is presented with  an  unusual spell, a
